medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with 1 day of abdominal pain that began periumbilically around 11 PM after eating fried chicken. The pain was dull and improved somewhat with NSAIDs but worsened with movement. It later migrated to the right lower quadrant. The patient also reports difficulty sleeping due to pain and transient shortness of breath, as well as recent constipation.
